## CommonPluginRuntime

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/plugins/plugin-runtime/runtime.ts" sourceLine="7" packageName="commandkit" />

Common plugin runtime type that can be used in both command and compiler plugins.

```ts title="Signature"
type CommonPluginRuntime = | CommandKitPluginRuntime
  | CompilerPluginRuntime
```
